cue.label: Introduction
cue.voice: Pull Jira issues into your repository so coding agents always have full context. No API calls, no MCP tools, just files.

cue.label: Sync
cue.voice: Run a single command to sync your entire project. Kanbus fetches every issue and translates types, statuses, and priorities automatically.

cue.label: Idempotent
cue.voice: Safe to re-run anytime. Existing issues are updated in place, keeping the local Kanbus IDs stable across syncs.

cue.label: Agents
cue.voice: Any agent that can read your source code can now read your Jira issues. The context travels with your branch and survives offline.
